attributes.additional_details:
With almost every body in the medical profession opposing his 'Health and Social Care' bill, voters almost unanimously opposed to it, and patient care set to suffer, we believe the incompetency of Mr Lansley has been revealed by this proposed 'backdoor privatisation'.

With recognition that ePetitions are centred on Parliamentary debates and votes rather than individual ministers, we the signatories ask that Parliament holds a debate on whether Andrew Lansley should resign as Secretary of State for Health, in the hope that this will increase pressure on him to resign.
